TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistrySecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class RegistrySecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示登錄機碼的 Windows 存取控制 (Access Control) 安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security for a registry key.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件指定登錄機碼的存取權限，也會指定如何稽核存取嘗試。A object specifies access rights for a registry key, and also specifies how access attempts are audited. 登錄機碼的存取權限由每個存取規則的規則，以表示物件。Access rights to the registry key are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by a object. 每個稽核規則由物件。Each auditing rule is represented by a object. 鏡像處理基礎的 Windows 安全性系統，在其中每個安全性實體的物件具有最多一個判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 控制對受保護的物件，和最多一個系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 指定的權限存取稽核嘗試。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL，SACL 會排序清單的指定存取和稽核的使用者和群組的存取控制項目 (ACE)。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. A或物件可能代表一個以上的 ACE。A or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > Windows 存取控制安全性只能套用到登錄機碼。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它無法套用至個別的索引鍵/值組儲存在索引鍵。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. ， ，和類別隱藏實作詳細資料的 Acl 和 Ace。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 可讓您略過十七不同 ACE 型別和複雜性的正確維護繼承和傳用的存取權限。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 這些物件也可避免下列常見的存取控制錯誤：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 建立 null DACL 的安全性描述元。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. DACL 的 null 參考可讓任何使用者將存取規則加入物件，而可能建立阻斷服務攻擊。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 新物件一律開頭空白的 DACL，拒絕對所有使用者的所有存取。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 違反 Ace 的標準順序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果在 DACL 中的 ACE 清單不會保留在標準順序，使用者可能會不小心提供存取受保護的物件。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 比方說，拒絕的存取權限必須一律會出現之前允許的存取權限。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 物件會在內部維護正確的順序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 管理安全性描述元旗標，這應該是僅資源管理員的控制之下。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 建立無效的 ACE 旗標組合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 操作繼承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 繼承和傳用是由資源管理員，以回應變更您對存取和稽核規則處理的。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 插入 Acl 中的無意義的 Ace。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. 不支援.NET 安全性物件的唯一功能是應避免大部分的應用程式開發人員，如下所示使用模擬的危險活動：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由資源管理員的低層級工作。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 新增或移除存取控制項目不會維護標準排序的方式。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改 Windows 登錄機碼的存取控制安全性，請使用方法來取得物件。To modify Windows access control security for a registry key, use the method to get the object. 新增和移除規則，以修改安全性物件，然後使用方法來重新附加它。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您所做的變更物件不會影響登錄機碼的存取層級直到您呼叫將更改的安全性物件指派到登錄機碼的方法。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 若要從一個登錄機碼的存取控制安全性複製到另一個中，使用方法來取得代表第一個登錄機碼的存取和稽核規則的物件，然後使用方法來指派這些規則以第二個登錄機碼。To copy access control security from one registry key to another, use the method to get a object representing the access and audit rules for the first registry key, and then use the method to assign those rules to the second registry key. 您也可以指派規則給第二個登錄機碼與或是採用方法物件參數。You can also assign the rules to a second registry key with an or method that takes a object parameter. 中的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 投資的使用者可以使用方法，以設定登錄機碼的存取規則和方法，以取得字串，表示 SDDL 格式中的存取規則。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a registry key, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 這不是建議用於新的開發。This is not recommended for new development. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例顯示如何相容的規則合併時新增和移除和第二個顯示繼承和傳用旗標會影響的新增和刪除的規則。The first example shows how compatible rules merge when added and removed, and the second shows how inheritance and propagation flags affect the addition and deletion of rules. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會將權限移除相容的規則，以及如何方法就會合併相容規則的權限。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件，並將規則，可讓目前的使用者加入權限。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 這個範例會建立一個規則，會授與使用者、 具有相同的繼承和傳用權限，做為第一個規則，並使用方法來移除這個新的規則，從物件。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的構成部分，因此它移除相容的規則。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 中的規則物件會出現，其中顯示剩餘的構成。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 範例程式碼會接著呼叫方法來合併回中的規則以滑鼠右鍵物件。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 在本節中的第二個範例附加安全性物件，並因此執行的範例和。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繼承和傳用的存取規則。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此範例會建立物件，然後建立並加入兩個規則，具有旗標。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一項規則有任何傳用旗標，而第二個和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 此程式會顯示在規則物件，然後使用物件來建立子機碼。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 該程式建立的子系子機碼和孫系子機碼，然後顯示每一個子機碼的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, then displays the security for each subkey. 最後，程式會刪除測試索引鍵。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件永遠會啟動具有空的判別存取清單 (DACL)，拒絕對所有使用者的所有存取。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別用來表示存取權限的列舉型別。

span.span: Gets the enumeration type that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 物件，表示 列舉型別。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們用來表示存取權限類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷要使用每個安全性物件的正確的列舉類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule AccessRuleFactory (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identityReference, int accessMask, bool isInherited, System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags inheritanceFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags propagationFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type);

span.span: A Boolean value specifying whether the rule is inherited.

span.span: A bitwise combination of values specifying how the rule is inherited by subkeys.

param.span: 值的位元組合，這些值會修改子機碼繼承規則的方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that modify the way the rule is inherited by subkeys.

summary.span: 以指定的存取權限、存取控制和旗標，為指定的使用者建立新的存取控制規則。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 物件，表示指定之使用者的指定權限。

span.span: A object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立存取控制規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以指定旗標，請在此情況下沒有意義。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 子機碼中的名稱/值組的存取控制的目的，不是個別物件。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名稱/值組的存取權限是由子機碼的權限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，因為所有子機碼是容器 （也就是它們可以包含其他子機碼），它們不會受到旗標。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最後，指定旗標不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，因為它會干擾一般相容規則的組合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 會指定無效的值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.

A object representing the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們用來表示存取規則類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷正確的存取規則型別，若要使用每個安全性物件。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要加入的存取控制規則。

span.span: The access control rule to add.

summary.span: 搜尋可合併新規則的相符存取控制。

span.span: Searches for a matching access control with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果找不到，就加入新規則。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋具有相同的使用者或群組和相同的規則做為`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`加入。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到相符的規則是中的權限`rule`會與現有的規則合併。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. 無法合併規則，如果它們有不同的繼承旗標。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 比方說，如果使用者允許讀取權限，但沒有繼承旗標，並用來新增規則，讓使用者寫入存取子機碼的繼承 ()，無法合併兩個規則。For example, if a user is allowed read access with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule giving the user write access with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged. 使用不同的規則值永遠不會合併。Rules with different values are never merged. 規則的最經濟實惠的方式表達權限。Rules express rights in the most economical way. 例如，如果使用者具有，並權限，而且您新增規則，允許權限，使用者擁有的所有構成部分權限。For example, if a user has , and rights, and you add a rule allowing rights, the user has all the constituent parts of rights. 如果您查詢使用者的權限，您會看到一個規則，其中包含權限。If you query the user's rights, you will see a rule containing rights. 同樣地，如果您移除權限的其他要素權限將會重新出現。Similarly, if you remove rights, the other constituents of rights will reappear. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立登錄存取規則，並將它們加入至物件，顯示如何允許和拒絕權限的規則會有所區隔，而相容的規則相同的類型會合併。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全性物件的範例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . 程式碼範例示範繼承和傳用旗標，可在類別。A code example that demonstrates inheritance and propagation flags can be found in the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

param.name: rule
param.span: 要加入的稽核規則。

span.span: The audit rule to add.

param.span: 這個規則指定的使用者會決定搜尋方式。

span.span: The user specified by this rule determines the search.

summary.span: 搜尋可合併新規則的稽核規則。

span.span: Searches for an audit rule with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果找不到，就加入新規則。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會搜尋具有相同的使用者或群組做為規則`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`加入。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到相符的規則是中的旗標`rule`會合併到現有的規則。If a matching rule is found, the flags in `rule` are merged into the existing rule. 無法合併規則，如果它們有不同的繼承旗標。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 如果要寫入的機碼的嘗試失敗，例如稽核特定的使用者，但沒有繼承旗標，和用來新增規則，指定相同的使用者，但具有繼承的稽核失敗的嘗試，若要變更權限子機碼 ()，無法合併兩個規則。For example, if failed attempts to write to a key are audited for a particular user, with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule specifying that failed attempts to change permissions are to be audited for the same user, but with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged.

summary.span: 建立新的稽核規則，指定套用該規則的使用者、要稽核的存取權限、規則的繼承和傳用，以及觸發規則的結果。

span.span: Creates a new audit rule, specifying the user the rule applies to, the access rights to audit, the inheritance and propagation of the rule, and the outcome that triggers the rule.

returns.span: 物件，表示指定之使用者的指定稽核規則，而且具有指定的旗標。

span.span: A object representing the specified audit rule for the specified user, with the specified flags.

returns.span: 此方法的傳回型別為基底類別 ，但是傳回值可以安全地轉型為衍生類別。

span.span: The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的稽核規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以指定旗標，請在此情況下沒有意義。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 基於稽核控制的目的，子機碼中的名稱/值組不是個別的物件。For the purposes of audit control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名稱/值組的稽核權限是由子機碼的權限控制。The audit rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，因為所有子機碼是容器 （也就是它們可以包含其他子機碼），它們不會受到旗標。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最後，指定旗標不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，因為它會干擾一般相容規則的組合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 會指定無效的值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.
is .
-or-
is zero.

exception.span: 既不是 型別，也不是可以轉換成 型別的型別 (例如 )。

span.span: is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AuditRuleType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AuditRuleType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別用來表示稽核規則的類型。

span.span: Gets the type that the class uses to represent audit rules.
A object representing the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們用來表示稽核權限類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent audit rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷正確的稽核規則型別，將每個安全性物件。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct audit rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As RegistryAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: ，其會指定要搜尋的使用者和 ，以及必須與相符的規則 (如果找到的話) 相容的繼承和傳用旗標集合。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 如果找到的話，指定從相容的規則中移除此權限。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜尋具有與指定之存取規則相同的使用者和 (允許或拒絕) 以及具有相容的繼承和傳用旗標的存取控制規則。如果找到這樣的規則，則會移除指定之存取規則中所包含的權限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified access rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到相容的規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前擁有相同的使用者和相同的規則中搜尋的值`rule`。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果找到任何這類規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找不到相符的規則，其繼承和相容性旗標會檢查在指定的旗標與相容性的`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不相容的規則，會採取任何動作，且此方法傳回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到相容的旗標的規則，在指定的權限`rule`移除相容的規則，且此方法傳回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不包含在相容的規則的權限，這些權限方面會採取任何動作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果從相容的規則，會移除所有的權限，整個規則會移除從目前物件。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會將權限移除相容的規則，以及如何方法就會合併相容規則的權限。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 此範例會建立物件，並將規則，可讓目前的使用者加入權限。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 這個範例會建立一個規則，會授與使用者、 具有相同的繼承和傳用權限，做為第一個規則，並使用方法來移除這個新的規則，從物件。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的構成部分，因此它移除相容的規則。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 中的規則物件會出現，其中顯示剩餘的構成。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 範例程式碼會接著呼叫方法來合併回中的規則以滑鼠右鍵物件。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 在本節中的第二個範例附加安全性物件，並因此執行的範例 。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 搜尋與指定規則具有相同使用者和 (允許或拒絕) 的所有存取控制規則，如果找到的話，便加以移除。

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前具有相同的使用者以及相同的規則中搜尋的值`rule`。The current is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. 任何權限、 繼承旗標或指定的傳用旗標`rule`執行這項搜尋時，會忽略。Any rights, inheritance flags, or propagation flags specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 如果找不到任何相符的規則，會不採取任何動作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. 例如，如果使用者有多個規則，允許以不同的繼承和傳用旗標的各種權限，您可以移除所有這些規則建立物件，指定使用者和、 以任何任意的權限和旗標並傳遞至該規則方法。For example, if a user has multiple rules that allow various rights with different inheritance and propagation flags, you can remove all those rules by creating a object that specifies the user and , with any arbitrary rights and flags, and passing that rule to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法會移除比對使用者的所有規則和，略過權限和旗標。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights and flags. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前的使用者，使用不同的繼承和傳用旗標的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓目前的使用者取得擁有權，並將傳遞至該規則方法以移除 允許存取的兩個規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and passes that rule to the method to remove the two rules that allow access. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 請參閱方法和方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜尋與指定規則完全相符的存取控制規則，如果找到的話，便加以移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除完全符合才`rule`中所有的詳細資訊，包括 旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 其他規則具有相同的使用者和不會受到影響。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎的存取控制項目 (ACE)，以及這些項目分割或修改使用者的存取安全性規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，規則可能不再存在中特定的表單時加入，並在此情況下方法無法將它移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法移除規則，只有當它完全符合。The following code example shows that the method removes a rule only if it matches exactly. 此範例會建立兩個規則可讓不同的權限。The example creates two rules that allow different rights. 規則會有相容的繼承和傳用旗標，因此當加入第二個規則合併的第一個。The rules have compatible inheritance and propagation flags, so when the second rule is added it merges with the first. 此範例會呼叫方法，並指定第一個規則，但因為合併的規則沒有符合任何規則。The example calls the method, specifying the first rule, but because the rules are merged there is no rule that matches. 此範例接著會呼叫從合併的規則，然後最後呼叫的方法來移除第二個規則方法來移除第一個規則。The example then calls the method to the remove the second rule from the merged rule, and finally calls the method to remove the first rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 請參閱方法和方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此規則會移除完全符合才`rule`中所有的詳細資訊，包括 旗標。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 不會影響其他的稽核規則相同的使用者。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 規則表示一或多個基礎的存取控制項目 (ACE)，以及這些項目分割或修改使用者的稽核安全性規則時，視需要結合。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，規則可能不再存在中特定的表單時加入，並在此情況下方法無法將它移除。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有使用者符合指定之規則的存取規則`rule`加入。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法會取代為相符的項目中指定之規則的比對使用者的所有規則。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前的使用者，使用不同的繼承和傳用旗標的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓目前使用者只能讀取機碼，並使用方法，以移除使用者的所有規則和它們取代成新的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the all rules for the user and replace them with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 請參閱方法和方法。See the method and the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的規則有，這個方法的效果是移除所有規則指定的使用者，並取代成指定的規則。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的規則有，則所有規則指定的使用者會取代指定的規則。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果沒有任何規則的使用者並符合指定之規則`rule`加入。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示方法會移除比對這兩個使用者的所有規則而的`rule`，而忽略權限和旗標，並取代它們與`rule`。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, ignoring rights and flags, and replaces them with `rule`. 此範例會建立物件，並新增規則，允許和拒絕目前的使用者，使用不同的繼承和傳用旗標的各種權限。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 這個範例會建立新的規則，可讓目前使用者只能讀取機碼，並使用方法，以移除 允許存取的兩個規則，並將其取代為新的規則。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the two rules that allow access and to replace them with the new rule. 不會影響的規則，拒絕存取。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加至安全性物件物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 請參閱方法和方法。See the method and the method.
